```py
import abc
import importlib

class Plugins(abc.ABCMeta):
    plugins = dict()

    def __new__(metaclass, name, bases, namespace):
        cls = abc.ABCMeta.__new__(
            metaclass, name, bases, namespace)
```

```py
**>>> class Spam(object):**
**…     eggs = 'my eggs'**

**>>> Spam = type('Spam', (object,), dict(eggs='my eggs'))**

```
